title: Business Analytics Immersion Programme
description:
This module aims to equip students with a first exposure to working in industry with theories, methods and applications of business analytics learnt during the first year of university education. Their progress on internship projects will be
monitored during internship period, and their performance will be assessed through a Completed Satisfactory/Completed Unsatisfactory (CS/CU) grade at the end of the internship. The internship duration will be approximately 12 weeks full-time.
